contact_page.question_1: What makes Kindle Hope Candles different from other shops?
contact_page.answer_1: Kindle Hope Candles stands out from other shops not only because we offer high-quality scented candles, but also because we are committed to giving back to the community. For every candle sold, we allocate a portion of our revenue to charitable activities, specifically aimed at helping children in remote and disadvantaged areas. Through this initiative, we strive to spread love and hope, making every purchase not just a product, but a meaningful contribution to society.
contact_page.question_2: How secure is my payment on Kindle Hope Candles?
contact_page.answer_2: At Kindle Hope Candles, your payment security is our top priority. We offer multiple secure payment methods, allowing you to complete your purchase with ease. Customers can pay through all major banks in Vietnam as well as popular e-wallets like Momo, VnPay, and ZaloPay. Our platform is equipped with advanced encryption technology to ensure that your personal and payment information remains safe and protected at all times.
contact_page.question_3: Can I personalize my Kindle Hope Candles experience?
contact_page.answer_3: Yes, at Kindle Hope Candles, we strive to make your experience as personalized as possible. You can choose from a variety of scents, and we also offer the option to create custom scent combinations that suit your preferences. Additionally, you can personalize your candles with custom labels for special occasions, making them perfect for gifts or personal use. We are committed to giving you a unique and meaningful experience with every candle purchase.
contact_page.question_4: Can I track the impact of my purchase with Kindle Hope Candles' charity efforts?
contact_page.answer_4: Absolutely! At Kindle Hope Candles, transparency is important to us. We provide regular updates on our charitable initiatives, so you can see exactly how your purchase is making a difference. Whether it’s supporting children in remote areas or funding educational projects, you’ll be able to track the positive impact through our website and social media channels. Your candle not only brightens your home but also brings hope to those in need.

delivery_policy_page.heading: Shipping and Delivery Policy
delivery_policy_page.sapo: At Kindle Hope Candles, we understand that shipping and delivery are important parts of the customer shopping experience. Therefore, we are committed to providing you with safe, fast, and transparent shipping services. Below are the specific policies regarding shipping and delivery at Kindle Hope Candles:
delivery_policy_page.p_1_sapo: We work with trusted delivery partners to ensure that goods are delivered to customers in the best condition. The shipping methods include:
delivery_policy_page.p_1_content:
• Standard Shipping: This is the most common shipping method. The delivery time will depend on the area and geographical distance. This method is suitable for most orders and helps customers save on shipping costs.
  • Express Shipping: With this method, your order will be prioritized for processing and delivered as quickly as possible. The cost will be higher than standard shipping, but it ensures fast delivery, especially for urgent orders.
  • Local Delivery Services: Depending on the geographical location, we may use local delivery partners to shorten the delivery time.
delivery_policy_page.p_2_sapo: The estimated delivery time will depend on the shipping location, the chosen shipping method, and the size of the order. Our estimated delivery times are as follows:
delivery_policy_page.p_2_content_1:
• Inner Ho Chi Minh City: Estimated delivery time is 1-2 business days.
  • Provinces near Ho Chi Minh City: Estimated delivery time is 2-4 business days.
  • Northern and Central regions: Estimated delivery time is 3-7 business days.
delivery_policy_page.p_2_content_2: Please note that delivery times may vary depending on factors such as weather conditions, traffic, or holidays. We will do our best to notify customers as soon as possible in case of any delays.
delivery_policy_page.p_3_content_1: Currently, Kindle Hope Candles only supports delivery within the territory of Vietnam. We do not offer international shipping.
delivery_policy_page.p_3_content_2: For remote, rural, or hard-to-reach areas, the delivery time may be longer than expected. If you have any questions about whether your address is within our delivery range, please contact us for detailed support.
delivery_policy_page.p_4_sapo: During the shipping and delivery process, the delivery unit is responsible for providing all relevant documents, including:
delivery_policy_page.p_4_content_1:
• Delivery Receipt: This serves as proof that the order has been delivered to the customer or an authorized recipient (if applicable).
  • Invoice: The invoice will be provided upon request, ensuring the validity and transparency of your transaction.
delivery_policy_page.p_4_content_2: If during the delivery process you need to request any documents related to your order, please contact our customer service team for support.
delivery_policy_page.p_5_heading: 5. Responsibilities and Notifications in Case of Delays
delivery_policy_page.p_5_sapo: We understand that delays in delivery can cause inconvenience to customers. Therefore, if any issues arise that cause delays in delivery, we commit to:
delivery_policy_page.p_5_content_1:
• Immediately notifying customers through the provided contact methods (email, phone number).
  • Providing information on the cause of the delay and the new estimated delivery time.
delivery_policy_page.p_5_content_2: In the event of a delay, customers have the right to choose to continue waiting or to cancel the order. If the customer chooses to cancel the order, we will proceed with a refund in accordance with the company's return and refund policies.
delivery_policy_page.p_6_sapo: If you have any questions regarding shipping and delivery, please contact us via:
delivery_policy_page.p_6_content_1:
• Email: kindlehopecandles@gmail.com
  • Phone Number: 0779741998
  • Headquarters Address: 245/11 Chu Van An, Ward 12, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

terms_and_conditions_page.heading: Terms & Conditions
terms_and_conditions_page.sapo: Thank you for choosing Kindle Hope Candles – a premium natural scented candle brand. We are committed to providing high-quality products and excellent services. Below are the general terms and conditions applied to all purchases made on the Kindle Hope Candles website. Please read carefully before placing an order.
terms_and_conditions_page.p_1_heading: 1. Conditions or Restrictions on the Supply of Goods or Services
terms_and_conditions_page.p_1_subheading_1: a) Geographical Scope of Goods Supply
terms_and_conditions_page.p_1_p_1_content:
• Kindle Hope Candles currently offers delivery services within the territory of Vietnam. We do not support international shipping at this time.
  • Delivery times may be limited and additional shipping costs may apply for remote mountainous areas or islands due to geographical characteristics.
terms_and_conditions_page.p_1_p_2_content:
• We accept online orders 24/7, but orders are processed from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM on working days (Monday to Friday).
  • Orders placed after 6:00 PM or on weekends and holidays will be processed on the next working day.
terms_and_conditions_page.p_2_p_1_content: Customers have the right to inspect the product before making payment and accepting delivery. If the product does not match the description (wrong model, color, size, or damaged during shipping), customers may refuse the delivery and notify customer service for support.
terms_and_conditions_page.p_2_p_2_content:
• Kindle Hope Candles accepts returns or exchanges within 7 days from the date of receipt. The product must be intact, unused, and in its original packaging, including any seals (if applicable).
  • For products defective due to manufacturing or shipping, we will cover the return shipping costs. If the return is due to a change of mind, the customer will be responsible for the shipping fees.
  • Refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned product and confirm the return conditions are met. The amount will be refunded through the original payment method (bank transfer, e-wallet, or credit card).
terms_and_conditions_page.p_3_content:
• Due to the consumable nature of scented candles, Kindle Hope Candles does not offer a product warranty.
  • However, we guarantee the quality of our products and will support exchanges or refunds for manufacturing defects.
terms_and_conditions_page.p_4_heading: 4. Service Standards and Terms of Service Provision
terms_and_conditions_page.p_4_p_1_content: Kindle Hope Candles is committed to providing a friendly, convenient, and secure online shopping experience. Our products are made from natural ingredients, ensuring they are safe for health and environmentally friendly.
terms_and_conditions_page.p_4_p_2_content:
1. Order Confirmation: After customers complete their order on the website, we will send an email confirmation with relevant details.
  2. Product Packaging: Products are carefully packaged to ensure safety during shipping.
  3. Delivery: Delivery times range from 1-5 business days depending on the delivery location. For remote areas, delivery times may be extended.
terms_and_conditions_page.p_4_p_3_content:
• Shipping costs will be calculated and clearly displayed before customers proceed with payment. We often have promotions on shipping fees for large orders or during promotional periods.
  • Kindle Hope Candles does not charge any additional service fees beyond those transparently listed on the website.
terms_and_conditions_page.p_5_heading: 5. Obligations of the Seller and Customer
terms_and_conditions_page.p_5_p_1_content:
• Provide complete and accurate information about products, services, and purchase policies.
  • Ensure the product is delivered in the correct quality, quantity, and condition as described on the website.
  • Handle complaints and returns in accordance with the stated policies.
  • Provide invoices and purchase documents upon the customer's request.
terms_and_conditions_page.p_5_p_2_content:
• Provide accurate information when placing an order (including delivery details, personal information, and payment method).
  • Inspect the product upon receipt and notify us immediately if any discrepancies or damage is found.
  • Make full and timely payment for the confirmed order.
  • Adhere to the return and exchange policies and bear the return shipping costs (if applicable).

privacy_policy_page.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy_page.sapo: Kindle Hope Candles is fully committed to protecting our customers' personal information. This policy describes in detail how we collect, use, store, and protect the personal data of consumers when they access and use services on the Kindle Hope Candles website. The collection and use of personal information will be carried out in accordance with legal regulations and a commitment to safeguarding customer rights.
privacy_policy_page.p_1_sapo: We collect customers' personal information for the following purposes:
privacy_policy_page.p_1_content:
1. Order processing and management: Personal information is used to confirm orders, deliver goods, and provide related support services such as order tracking and handling complaints.
  2. Customer account management: Personal information helps us create and manage customer accounts on the system, ensuring customers can access order history, manage their information, and use exclusive services and offers.
  3. Improving user experience: Kindle Hope Candles uses customer information to better understand shopping preferences, thereby personalizing experiences and recommending suitable products.
  4. Customer care: Customer contact information is used to send information about new products, promotions, or important notices related to our services.
  5. Meeting legal requirements: In certain cases, we may collect and use personal information to comply with requests from competent authorities, ensuring adherence to legal regulations.
privacy_policy_page.p_2_sapo: We only use customers' personal information in the following cases:
privacy_policy_page.p_2_content:
1. Within Kindle Hope Candles: Personal information is shared among necessary departments within the company to carry out activities related to order management, customer care, and service optimization.
  2. Linked partners: Information may be shared with third parties directly involved in order fulfillment, including shipping and payment service providers. We are committed to sharing information only with trusted partners who are responsible for protecting this data.
  3. In special cases: Personal information may be disclosed at the request of competent authorities or when we believe it is necessary to protect the legitimate rights of Kindle Hope Candles or its customers.
privacy_policy_page.p_3_content:
1. Account information: Personal information related to customer accounts will be stored until the customer requests the deletion of the account or when it is no longer necessary for us to retain the information based on legal requirements.
  2. Transaction-related information: Personal information related to purchases will be stored for five years from the completion of the transaction to meet auditing requirements or other legal obligations.
  3. Request for information deletion: If a customer requests the deletion of their personal data, we will process this request within 30 days, except in cases where data retention is required by law.
privacy_policy_page.p_4_heading: 4. Individuals or Organizations That May Have Access to Personal Information
privacy_policy_page.p_4_content:
1. Kindle Hope Candles employees: Only authorized employees directly involved in order processing and customer care have access to customer personal information. All employees are required to comply with information security policies and are legally responsible for protecting customer data.
  2. Shipping and payment partners: Partners involved in shipping and payment processing will have access to the necessary information to fulfill their services. We require these partners to comply with strict privacy regulations.
  3. Government authorities: Personal information may be disclosed at the request of competent state authorities in cases of legal investigations or as required by applicable law.
privacy_policy_page.p_5_heading: 5. Contact Information for Data Collection and Management
privacy_policy_page.p_5_content_1:
• Address: 245/11 Chu Van An, Ward 12, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City
  • Email: kindlehopecandles@gmail.com
  • Phone number: 0779741998
privacy_policy_page.p_5_content_2: Customers can contact Kindle Hope Candles through the above channels for inquiries regarding the collection, use, and management of their personal information. Our support team is always ready to answer any questions related to this matter.
privacy_policy_page.p_6_heading: 6. Methods and Tools for Consumers to Access and Edit Their Personal Data
privacy_policy_page.p_6_content:
1. Log into personal account: Customers can log into their personal accounts on the Kindle Hope Candles website to view, edit, and update their personal information directly on the system. This includes changes to contact information, delivery addresses, and other account-related preferences.
  2. Contact via email or hotline: Customers can also request to edit, update, or delete their personal information by contacting our customer care team directly via email or phone. We will process such requests within 5-7 working days.
privacy_policy_page.p_7_sapo: We understand that protecting our customers' personal information is of utmost importance. If a customer believes their personal information has been used for unauthorized purposes or beyond the scope outlined, they can file a complaint through the following methods:
privacy_policy_page.p_7_content:
1. File a complaint via email or direct contact: Customers can file complaints with Kindle Hope Candles via email or by directly contacting our customer service department. Upon receiving the complaint, we will confirm and initiate the handling process.
  2. Complaint resolution timeline: Kindle Hope Candles commits to responding to and resolving complaints related to the protection of personal information within 7 working days from the date of receiving the request. We will investigate the issue and notify the customer of the results and specific resolution plan.
privacy_policy_page.p_8_content_1: This privacy policy will be publicly and clearly displayed on the Kindle Hope Candles website at the time of collecting customers' personal information. We encourage customers to read this information carefully to understand their rights and responsibilities when using our services.
privacy_policy_page.p_8_content_2: Kindle Hope Candles places great importance on protecting personal information and is committed to taking all necessary measures to safeguard customer privacy.

faq_page.desc_1: These are the most frequently asked questions when customers use Kindle Hope Candles' scented products.
faq_page.desc_3: Chat with our support team right away!
faq_page.question_1: What makes Kindle Hope Candles different from other products?
faq_page.answer_1: Kindle Hope Candles are made from natural ingredients, chemical-free soy wax, and premium essential oils, providing a gentle fragrance that's safe for your health. Additionally, with every product you purchase, you're contributing to our charity initiatives, spreading hope and love to those in need.
faq_page.question_2: How does Kindle Hope Candles support charity work?
faq_page.answer_2: We are committed to donating a portion of the revenue from each product sold to charity organizations, especially those supporting underprivileged children and sustainable community development projects. When you buy our candles, you're not only enjoying a great product but also helping to create positive change in society.
faq_page.question_3: Are Kindle Hope Candles safe to use indoors?
faq_page.answer_3: Absolutely! Our candles are made from natural soy wax and essential oils free of harmful chemicals, helping to minimize black smoke and provide fresh air. The candle wicks are also lead-free, ensuring safety for your family and pets.
faq_page.question_4: Can I reuse the candle containers after the candle has burned out?
faq_page.answer_4: Yes! Our candle containers are elegantly designed and durable, so you can reuse them as decorative containers, storage boxes for small items, or mini plant pots. Reusing the containers also helps reduce waste and protect the environment.
faq_page.answer_5: We are happy to customize scents according to personal preferences or special occasions such as weddings, birthday parties, or as gifts. Please contact us for consultation and to place an order for your personalized candles!
faq_page.question_6: Does Kindle Hope Candles offer any promotions or discounts?
faq_page.answer_6: We frequently have attractive promotional programs, especially during major holidays. You can also subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest promotions and exclusive discount codes for loyal customers.
faq_page.question_7: How do I order Kindle Hope Candles' scented candles?
faq_page.answer_7: You can easily place an order through our website or via our official social media pages. Just select the product you love, add it to your cart, complete the payment, and wait for us to deliver it promptly to your doorstep.
faq_page.question_8: What is Kindle Hope Candles' return and exchange policy?
faq_page.answer_8: We ensure the quality of our products and customer satisfaction. If there are any issues with the product, you can contact us within 7 days from the date of receipt for assistance with exchanging or returning the product according to our policy.

about_us_page.heading: About Kindle Hope Candles
about_us_page.sapo: Welcome to Kindle Hope Candles, where we believe that each candle not only brings a gentle fragrance but also symbolizes warmth, hope, and kindness. Here, we are not only creating high-quality scented candles but also striving to make a positive difference in the community through charitable activities.
about_us_page.sapo_2:
• Company name: Kindle Hope Candles Co., Ltd.
  • Head office address: 245/11 Chu Van An, Ward 12, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City
  • Phone number: 0779741998

  • First registration: August 30, 2024
  • Place of issue: Business Registration Office - Department of Planning and Investment of Ho Chi Minh City
about_us_page.p_1_heading: Our journey began with passion and sharing
about_us_page.p_1_content_1: Kindle Hope Candles was founded by a group of fragrance enthusiasts who wanted to spread love. Starting with simple candles used at home, we gradually expanded our production with the goal of providing delicate and distinctive fragrance experiences for everyone.
about_us_page.p_1_content_2: Each of our candles is made from natural, safe, and eco-friendly materials. Moreover, every detail in the production process is meticulously crafted to ensure the highest quality. However, what sets us apart is not just our scented candles but the mission of Kindle Hope Candles.
about_us_page.p_2_heading: Commitment to the community - Scented candles, big hope
about_us_page.p_2_content_1: For every candle sold, we donate a portion of the revenue to charitable activities. This stems from our desire to create real value for the society and community we live in.
about_us_page.p_2_content_2: We believe that even a small action can lead to significant changes. That's why we chose the name 'Kindle Hope' – to light the flame of hope. By purchasing scented candles from Kindle Hope Candles, you not only bring home a wonderful product but also contribute to supporting those in need and vulnerable communities.
about_us_page.p_3_sapo: Currently, we are collaborating with several charitable organizations and community funds to ensure that the contributions are used effectively and transparently. Some of the projects we have participated in include:
about_us_page.p_3_content:
• Supporting education for underprivileged children: We allocate a portion of our revenue to fund scholarships for students in need. We believe that education is the key to changing lives and bringing about a brighter future.
  • Providing essential supplies to the homeless: In line with our mission of sharing, Kindle Hope Candles also engages in distributing food, warm clothes, and essentials to the homeless, especially during the cold winter months.
  • Environmental protection: In addition to charitable activities, we also donate a portion of our revenue to support environmental protection and recycling projects. We understand that protecting the environment is crucial for the well-being of both present and future generations.
about_us_page.p_4_heading: Our products - the perfect combination of fragrance and soul
about_us_page.p_4_sapo: The scented candles from Kindle Hope Candles are not just decorative items or tools for creating a relaxing atmosphere. Each candle is a work of art, infused with the passion and love of the artisans who make them. We strive to offer a variety of designs and fragrances to suit different preferences and spaces.
about_us_page.p_4_content:
• Natural scented candles: All of our products are made from natural soy wax, free of harmful chemicals, ensuring safety for the user's health.
  • Diverse fragrances: From gentle scents like lavender and vanilla to luxurious ones like sandalwood and cinnamon, we always aim to provide a wide range of choices to meet every customer's needs.
  • Design style: With simple, elegant designs, the candles from Kindle Hope Candles not only fit various interior styles but also make meaningful gifts for loved ones and friends.
about_us_page.p_5_content_1: The vision of Kindle Hope Candles is to become a brand not only known for high-quality scented candles but also recognized as a symbol of sharing and love within the community. We want each customer who thinks of Kindle Hope Candles to feel proud of contributing to a greater cause – helping those less fortunate.
about_us_page.p_5_content_2: Our mission is to continue bringing exceptional, safe, and eco-friendly scented candles to the market. At the same time, Kindle Hope Candles is committed to expanding charitable activities, strengthening community connections, and spreading love through every product.
about_us_page.p_6_content_1: We could not complete this journey without the support and companionship of our customers. Your trust has enabled Kindle Hope Candles to continue growing and extending its positive influence within the community. Every time you light a candle, you not only brighten your space but also kindle hope for those in need.
about_us_page.p_6_content_2: Kindle Hope Candles sincerely thanks all customers, partners, and everyone who has accompanied us throughout this journey. We are committed to continually striving to provide the best products and contribute more to the community.
about_us_page.p_7_content: If you want to learn more about our products or the charitable activities we are involved in, don't hesitate to reach out to Kindle Hope Candles. We are always ready to listen to your feedback and suggestions to improve our services and products every day.

payment_methods_page.heading: Payment Methods
payment_methods_page.sapo: At Kindle Hope Candles, we always prioritize our customers' shopping experience by providing secure, convenient, and easy-to-understand payment methods. You can choose the payment method that best suits your needs when purchasing products or using services on our website. Please refer to the following instructions to make your payment easily and securely.
payment_methods_page.p_1_sapo_1: Bank transfer payment is a simple and fast payment method. After completing your order on the website, you can make a payment by transferring funds to our bank account as follows:
payment_methods_page.p_1_sapo_2:
• Account holder: Phạm Huỳnh Linh
  • Account number: 9099 6666 8888
  • Bank: Military Commercial Joint Stock Bank (MB Bank)
payment_methods_page.p_1_p_1_content:
1. After placing your order, log into your internet banking service or banking app to make the transfer.
  2. Enter the recipient’s details as provided, including the account holder’s name, account number, and bank name.
  3. Please enter the correct transfer details so we can easily confirm your order.
payment_methods_page.p_1_p_2_content:
• For candle orders: Please specify the details as: TT nen thom KHC
  • For donations via the website: If you are making a donation through the Donation page, please specify the details as: Dong gop + Amount (Example: Dong gop 500000)
payment_methods_page.p_1_subheading_3: c) Notes on bank transfer payments:
payment_methods_page.p_1_p_3_content:
• After completing the transfer, please keep your transaction receipt or take a screenshot for future reference if needed.
  • Your order will be processed after we receive confirmation of successful payment from the bank. Typically, confirmation of bank transfers takes 1-2 business hours.
  • If you do not receive a confirmation from Kindle Hope Candles within 24 hours of the transfer, please contact us for support.
payment_methods_page.p_2_sapo: PayOS is a trusted online payment gateway that Kindle Hope Candles uses to secure our customers' online transactions. Your entire payment process will be handled through PayOS, ensuring the highest level of security for your personal and financial information.
payment_methods_page.p_2_subheading_1: a) How to pay via QR code using PayOS:
payment_methods_page.p_2_p_1_content:
1. Select your product and complete your order on the Kindle Hope Candles website.
  2. After order confirmation, the system will display a payment QR code.
  3. Open your banking app or e-wallet (such as VNPay, Momo, ZaloPay).
  4. Use the app's QR code scanning feature to scan the displayed QR code.
  5. Payment information will be automatically filled in, including the amount and order details.
  6. Simply confirm the transaction to complete the payment.
payment_methods_page.p_2_subheading_2: b) Advantages of QR code payment:
payment_methods_page.p_2_p_2_content:
1. Fast and convenient: Simply open the app, scan the QR code, and confirm. No need to manually enter information.
  2. High security: All transactions are encrypted and protected by PayOS's secure system, giving you peace of mind when making payments.
  3. Compatible with many banking apps and e-wallets: Supports most popular payment apps such as VNPay, Momo, ZaloPay, and many other banking apps.
payment_methods_page.p_3_content:
• Kindle Hope Candles will only deliver products once payment has been successfully completed via PayOS or bank transfer.
  • After receiving payment confirmation, we will proceed to pack and ship your order within 1-2 business days.
  • If you encounter any issues during the payment process, you can contact our support team immediately via email or phone for assistance.
payment_methods_page.p_4_content:
• After completing the payment, you will receive a confirmation email from Kindle Hope Candles, including detailed information about your order and payment.
  • For orders paid via bank transfer, if you do not receive a confirmation from us within 24 hours after the transfer, please contact us to check and verify.
  • Kindle Hope Candles recommends that you always double-check payment information before proceeding, especially for bank transfers, to avoid errors or mistakes.
payment_methods_page.p_5_sapo: We understand that your financial information is extremely important. Therefore, Kindle Hope Candles is committed to:
payment_methods_page.p_5_content:
• Absolute confidentiality of all information related to the payment process.
  • No storage of credit card information or any sensitive financial data. All transactions are processed through the PayOS payment gateway with international security standards.
  • Strict compliance with legal regulations on personal information protection and financial security.
payment_methods_page.p_6_content_1: If you have any questions about payment methods or experience difficulties during the process, please contact us via:
payment_methods_page.p_6_content_3: We are always ready to assist you to ensure your payment experience is smooth and secure.
